pages.text: $(o)"Writing is the quite fantastic power to ensure your thoughts are known to others, even beyond death."$()
Centered on the $(l:astral:library#index)Index of Knowledge$(/l), the Library measures your internal knowledge as detected by bookshelves and lecterns with appropriate books on them.

Benefits: You can channel your experience and intentions into it, or regain health, and regain a tenth of your invested levels and learning thereafter. Each tier of knowledge requires ten times the new sought level in levels from you.
